snippet: Chelsea defender Branislav Ivanovic has signed a one-year deal keeping him at Stamford Bridge until the end of the 2016-17  season, the Premier League champions said on Friday....

headline.main: Chelsea Defender Ivanovic Signs New One-Year Deal
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Defender Ivanovic Signs New One-Year Deal

lead_paragraph: Chelsea defender Branislav Ivanovic has signed a one-year deal keeping him at Stamford Bridge until the end of the 2016-17  season, the Premier League champions said on Friday.

snippet: Bob Bradley was frustrated he was not given enough time to implement his ideas at Swansea City after he was sacked by the struggling Premier League club on Tuesday after just 11 games in charge....

headline.main: Bradley Left Frustrated Over Lack of Time at Swansea
headline.print_headline: Bradley Left Frustrated Over Lack of Time at Swansea

lead_paragraph: Bob Bradley was frustrated he was not given enough time to implement his ideas at Swansea City after he was sacked by the struggling Premier League club on Tuesday after just 11 games in charge.

snippet: Two quickfire late goals from Harry Kane sealed an astonishing Tottenham Hotspur comeback in a pulsating 3-2 Premier League victory over West Ham United at White Hart Lane on Saturday....

headline.main: Spurs Win as Kane Stuns West Ham With Two Late Goals
headline.print_headline: Spurs Win as Kane Stuns West Ham With Two Late Goals

lead_paragraph: Two quickfire late goals from Harry Kane sealed an astonishing Tottenham Hotspur comeback in a pulsating 3-2 Premier League victory over West Ham United at White Hart Lane on Saturday.

snippet: Stoke City midfielder Xherdan Shaqiri appears set to return from an extended injury layoff for Wednesday's League Cup tie against Hull City after resuming training, assistant manager Mark Bowen has said....

headline.main: Shaqiri in Contention to Make Stoke Return Against Hull
headline.print_headline: Shaqiri in Contention to Make Stoke Return Against Hull

lead_paragraph: Stoke City midfielder Xherdan Shaqiri appears set to return from an extended injury layoff for Wednesday's League Cup tie against Hull City after resuming training, assistant manager Mark Bowen has said.

snippet: Spanish striker Fernando Llorente has joined Premier League Swansea City from Sevilla, the Welsh club said on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Spanish striker Fernando Llorente has joined Premier League Swansea City from Sevilla, the Welsh club said on Friday.

snippet: Alvaro Negredo can rediscover his mojo in the Premier League at newly-promoted Middlesbrough after struggling to make an impact since his move to Valencia, manager Aitor Karanka has said....

headline.main: Manager Karanka Backs Negredo to Find Form at Middlesbrough
headline.print_headline: Manager Karanka Backs Negredo to Find Form at Middlesbrough

lead_paragraph: Alvaro Negredo can rediscover his mojo in the Premier League at newly-promoted Middlesbrough after struggling to make an impact since his move to Valencia, manager Aitor Karanka has said.

snippet: Everton's veteran midfielder Gareth Barry has scotched any notion of imminent retirement, saying his commitment to top-level football has not waned as he looks ahead to a 20th campaign in the Premier League....

headline.main: Everton Veteran Barry Dismisses Retirement Talk
headline.print_headline: Everton Veteran Barry Dismisses Retirement Talk

lead_paragraph: Everton's veteran midfielder Gareth Barry has scotched any notion of imminent retirement, saying his commitment to top-level football has not waned as he looks ahead to a 20th campaign in the Premier League.

snippet: Title challengers Tottenham Hotspur will not be distracted by the prospect of lifting the Premier League trophy in May and are solely focused on their upcoming fixtures, midfielder Mousa Dembele said....

headline.main: Spurs Won't Dream of Title During Run-In, Says Dembele
headline.print_headline: Spurs Won't Dream of Title During Run-In, Says Dembele

lead_paragraph: Title challengers Tottenham Hotspur will not be distracted by the prospect of lifting the Premier League trophy in May and are solely focused on their upcoming fixtures, midfielder Mousa Dembele said.

snippet: Austrian international Marko Arnautovic has signed a four-year extension with Stoke City, the Premier League club announced on Wednesday....

headline.main: Arnautovic Signs Four-Year Extension With Stoke
headline.print_headline: Arnautovic Signs Four-Year Extension With Stoke

lead_paragraph: Austrian international Marko Arnautovic has signed a four-year extension with Stoke City, the Premier League club announced on Wednesday.

snippet: Leicester City's remarkable Premier League triumph after starting the season as 5,000-1 outsiders transcends sport and might never be repeated, according to the league's executive chairman Richard Scudamore....

headline.main: Leicester Triumph Transcends Sport, Says Scudamore
headline.print_headline: Leicester Triumph Transcends Sport, Says Scudamore

lead_paragraph: Leicester City's remarkable Premier League triumph after starting the season as 5,000-1 outsiders transcends sport and might never be repeated, according to the league's executive chairman Richard Scudamore.
